item.description:
Come see NHC members Meredith and Gregg's band Crash 21 at Lanza's Restaurant in Ansonia on Friday, November 18th. They'll be playing some new songs and old favorites including their covers of Bruce Springsteen, The Stray Cats, Green Day, No Doubt, Billy Joel and many more!

Lanza's also offers a great Italian menu should anyone be interested in going there for dinner beforehand (not as part of the meetup). Their website is: http://lanzarestaurant.com/ There is no cover for this event. Parking is available on the street and in nearby (free) parking lots.

George will be the host for the evening, 562-305-3201. Feel free to email Meredith with any questions before the show, or call George the day of!
item.name: Crash 21 (Rock and Punk Cover band with our own Meredith and Gregg)
